function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airflow patterns may contribute to the spread of diseases in occupied volumes.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne cross-infection and transmission of diseases.","Mitigation":"Utilize displacement ventilation to create a more controlled and directional airflow.","Technologies":"Displacement ventilation systems, air purifiers, and HEPA filters.","People":"Occupants of mechanically ventilated rooms, especially those in close proximity to sick individuals.","Owner":"Building managers, HVAC engineers, and health and safety professionals."}]}
